## LocalPointerEvent type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type LocalPointerEvent = PointerEvent & {
    origin: Vector3;
    direction: Vector3;
    pointer: Pointer;
    hit?: PointerEvent['hit'] & {
        hitPoint: Vector3;
        normal: Vector3;
        worldNormal: Vector3;
    };
};
```
